website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are a long-time fan of Birkenstock sandals or are looking for your first pair, you can't go wrong with the traditional Arizona style that has been a favorite for generations.
pros: Offers the brand's traditional 2-buckle styling that is recognizable look by the popular brand
cons: A break-in period may be required for some wearers
though it typically isn't too long

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: Look nothing like the picture. They are sinthetic not real leather. Fake. Fake. Fake. Not real Birkenstocks.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Hayes

customer_reviews.title: YAS KWEEN
customer_reviews.text: I got the copper leather version, size 38N (I normally wear a women's US 7, and they're the perfect fit for me). These feel just like I remember when I was a kid! Soooo comfortable. I wish they were less expensive-- this was a splurge. If they were, I would buy more colors. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as soft foot bed, received hard foot bed.  Verify with seller BEFORE you buy if you want soft food bed.
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for Birkenstocks on Amazon for quite awhile. I wanted a soft foot bed and these were advertised as such. The sandals shipped to me were NOT soft foot bed as I was expecting. The seller replied within one day and stated they did not have the soft foot bed, and provided information to return these to them. I decided to go ahead and keep the hard foot bed sandals sent to me, still trying to break them in. Not very comfortable at first. I understand from others that have Brikenstocks, it takes awhile to break them in. I hope I enjoy them once they become more comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Careful of who you purchase from.
customer_reviews.text: Received a right and left that were totally different fits and comforts. Not pleased. See photo for details.
customer_reviews.author: ambrasure

customer_reviews.title: Sooo Amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect! I love them! Soooo comfortable I wear them everywhere and the match pretty muc everything! These are about 2 weeks old, and again I have been wearing them everyday! I bought a size 35 R and if this helps I wear a 5 in woman's Nikes, and a 3.5 in converse. I would recommend getting the Regular in your size if you have wider feet! They are perfect and authentic love them!
customer_reviews.author: Annahlee

customer_reviews.title: Shoes and straps too big!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8-8.5 in shoes so I ordered a 39. I got these in the mail today and they are way too big! When I adjust my toes to fit nicely into the mold, I can fit my entire thumb in the heel! The straps are already as tight as they can be, and I guess I have skinny feet because the straps are also too big. When I walk in them I have to flex my toes up to make sure the shoes don't slide off. Disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.author: Alix

customer_reviews.title: Better off spending the extra $20 to get them shipped directly from Birkenstock indtead of spending over $100 for a fake shoe
customer_reviews.text: These sandals arrived with dirt on one of the straps and the glue was peeling at some seams. I’ve owned two pairs of Birkenstocks before—both of which had many miles walked into them—and neither had the straps come apart from the foot bed. After reading many negative reviews stating the purchaser’s sandals came apart after a month or two of wear, I will not take my chances on wearing these sandals and will be returning them. Better off spending the extra $20 to get them shipped directly from Birkenstock indtead of spending over $100 for a fake shoe
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son. I ordered the black suede with soft footbed. What I got was some fake pleather type material on a regular bed. I don't actually know if these are fake, but they really tried to do a bait and switch. I promptly returned the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DB508

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy that I have to pay to return these shoes. I am a prime member and enjoy the convenience of having the return policy and not having to pay. Not with this company. These shoes were too big and I would have in the future bought another pair that would fit but now that I am having to return these I will not be buying from this company. Extremely unhappy with this when I am a prime member.
customer_reviews.author: Marta K Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Love love the iron distressed color
customer_reviews.text: Love love the iron distressed color. Steel gray khaki. Will go with everything. I usually wear 8.5 in women’s, I ordered a 38 which is my perfect size for Birks.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sen

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love Birkenstocks, but this particular shoe just did not agree with my foot. I could tell as soon as I tried them on after delivery that they would end up being a problem. I believe it is the oiled leather more than anything else. The soft footbed is awesome, highly recommend that, but the buckle immediately pressed against the top of my foot. And I just was wearing them around the house. Had I decided to keep these sandals, I would have blisters and a pair of unused expensive shoes. I returned them and purchased the same sandal, same color, only in suede, and they are AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: gidge66

customer_reviews.title: BEST for ACHING/PAINFUL FEET
customer_reviews.text: Real Birkenstocks are the BEST footwear ever. I have plantar fasciitis and really struggle with fit. I wear them year round b/c I have to wear shoes (not slippers) in the house and I cannot go barefoot. Slip on and off. No hassles. If your feet are in pain, TRY a pair. You will never regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Murtry

customer_reviews.title: I want to love these, but I'm so disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: I want to love these, but I'm so disappointed in the quality! The fur is rubbing off, after light, indoor use only. Very frustrating for a sandal that costs so much.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe lover

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like Birkenstocks
customer_reviews.text: I bought Birkenstocks size 36R in black Birko-Flor. Nothing beats Birkenstock’s support and quality. I bought my first pair around 1977 and the quality is just as good now as then (although back then they only came in suede leather). Be careful with sizing: in most European shoes I wear 37 but in Birkenstock sandals, 36, and in US 6.5.
customer_reviews.author: s. kaku

customer_reviews.title: Seems Like a Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: When this was delivered I had a feeling it wasn’t genuine because of the weight of the box. The sandals seemed a lesser quality than previous ones. I have those exact same pair that are 5 years old so I compared the two. Obviously my old pair were worn but the new pair were at least half an inch narrower. I might even go with 3/4 inch narrower. What a disappointment. I returned these and purchased a pair directly from Birkenstock. Those were heavier, better quality, and the same width. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Shoe chica

customer_reviews.title: KNOCK OFF PRODUCT/NOT REAL BIRKENSTOCK'S
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THESE SHOES. THEY START FALLING APART AFTER VERY LITTLE WEAR. HAD TO GO AND GET NEW ONES AT THE SHOE STORE/AUTHORIZED BIRKENSTOCK DEALER AND WAS TOLD THE SHOES PURCHASED FROM AMAZON WERE KNOCK OFFS THATS WHY THEY WERE FALLING APART.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hurliman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure these are fakes - leather on the footpad split
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty sure the pair shipped to me were fakes. The leather in the footpad is splitting. Both on the heels and under the balls of the feet. It also looks like the layer under the leather is not cork. Usually the cork needs to be re-glued and I can wear through one or two replacement soles, but this pair still has the original soles and the sole pattern is intact. They have nominal wear yet the foot pad leather is failing.
customer_reviews.author: C.D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Fakes, and not even good ones--returned these immediately :(
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Birkenstock owner and wearer for more than 20 years--long enough to know when I see fakes. Unfortunately, these silver "Birkenstock Arizona" sandals were both fake and (apparently) used. They were shipped in a plastic bag instead of the Birkenstock box, with a tag attached to one buckle with a plastic strap; buckles were overly shiny, not like real Birk buckles; there were crumbs ground into the foot cup on one shoe; and the shoes had numerous pockmarks and scuffs. It was very disappointing to receive these sorry excuses for my favorite shoe brand. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: mapleviking

customer_reviews.title: These are FAKE
customer_reviews.text: These are completely FAKE! Birkenstock’s have full leather straps not a top layer of leather, fake fake fake buyer beware. The pictures show the difference between REAL and FAKE.
customer_reviews.author: jesse cytron

customer_reviews.title: NOT the soft footbed!
customer_reviews.text: These are not Birkenstock soft footbeds. I don't know what they are, but they are not as soft as any other soft footbed Birk I've owned. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE of Fake Birkenstocks
customer_reviews.text: The threat of buying fake Birkenstocks is always out there. As the attached photos show between the black (fake) and brown (real) pair, one can see the differences. The black leather is clearly thinner and less supple ("full grain leather" at best rather than Birkenstock "top grain"), the footbeds aren't Birkenstock and packaging aren't Birkenstock (though convincing at quick glance): compare the footbed printing, product tags, and Birkenstock watermark on the real Birks v. the gray paper included with the fakes. Since real soft bed Birkenstocks cost $135, it's perhaps no surprise that fake versions would saturate the market.
customer_reviews.author: S. Graffiti

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these birks
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these birks. These are my 10 th pair of the Arizona....all in different colors. They are the only shoes I will wear in warm weather. I bought my very first pair over 40 years ago and am STILL wearing them !! THis is my first pair of "non leather" birks and I have to say it's hard to tell that it is not actually leather. I have found that the N width is perfect for a medium width foot. The birks look like huge and fit far better .
customer_reviews.author: nutznboltz

customer_reviews.title: Not fake!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried these would be fake based on other reviews, but my box came with the Birkenstock tissue paper, correct box, thick leather sandals that fit perfectly. I'm a 10/10.5 and ordered a 41 (10/10.5) M and they're perfectly comfortable. I have pretty narrow feet and had to buckle my sandals all the way but I still wouldn't have ordered the narrow size because everywhere else seemed okay, just maybe something to think about when ordering! If you're worried about fake shoes order through Amazon Prime verified only, if they seem fake you can at least return them!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Angus

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality! I would not recommend this shoe in the copper color. I purchased these for my 12 year old daughter and one day after wearing them they have scratches on them. I intend to write and post photos directly on the Birkenstock website. These shoes were over $100.00 and I expect them to hold up longer than 1 day of wear. Very poor quality. They look like she has been wearing them for 5 years not 1 day!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: These come without a box or tags. They were loosely in a shipping box. They were scratched up and are knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: mom24

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - you don’t get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The holes in the straps are positioned in such a way that the shoe fit very loosely over my foot. I had to punch a new hole into the strap so that it could buckle over my foot snugly and comfortably. Also, after less than two months of wear, the glue started coming undone at the space where the front strap meets the some, revealing the lackluster quality of this expensive product. I don’t expect these shoes to last more than a month or so. I won’t be buying from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my birkenstocks
customer_reviews.text: I love my birkenstocks! My last pair are still in use after two years! I purchased these a month ago and the leather strap is cracked already. Do not purchase these if you are looking for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT leather, way too BIG
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue in size 40M. They are not leather, they are the Vegan variety, NOT specified as such so I wasn’t expecting these. Also, I ordered the 40M which should fit a women’s size 9-9 1/2 and they are HUMONGOUS! They are closer to a size 42. I should have known that $75. for leather Birkenstock’s was too good to be true. :( I’m in the process of returning them.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: A classic and a relief from plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: I have horrible plantar fasciitis, and Birkenstocks are a godsend. I've been wearing them for years. It takes a couple of days for your feet to adjust to having actual support, but once they do, you'll be hesitant to wear anything else. The Arizona model is the most popular and is often the choice for Birkenstock virgins. They're functional, easy to put on, and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lost $15 to return it because it is larg!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my daughter, I followed their chart to convert Europe size to US size, I should have followed what’s on google rather what they post on Amazon, anyway I thought it’s a good idea to listen to the manufacturer, the size is way larger than what we need! So I decided to return for a replacement! I found that this is not easy because you have to put a request to return then wait for the approval and after they approve you have to ship it back and also you have to pay for that! I decided not to get another pair! It’s not worth it, many competitors in the market to buy from!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: MOST UNCOMFORTABLE SANDAL!
customer_reviews.text: This adorable sandal is just so uncomfortable for me! I have rather normal feet with the exception of being a little flat-footed. I know there is a break in period. Yet, there was no way I could wear this sandal every day for a week or two to break them in. I fear my feet would be so sore and probably bruised. If you are a regular Birkenstock wearer (and can bear the break in period), this metallic taupe sandal is quite pretty. If you have never worn Birkenstocks before, know that this sandal feels like walking on an uncomfortable and uneven board of wood.
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: FIRST Clothing sells fakes.
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy from FIRST Clothing - these shoes are not the real deal. Something is off. I've had two pairs of Birks before, and both lasted a long time. These rapidly declined and the straps separated from the cork bottom (bad glue/refurbished shoe). Go spend $20 more and get some real ones from Birkenstock that last.
customer_reviews.author: Jabez

customer_reviews.title: Description Is Incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Description states these sandals are for 11-11.5 Women’s and 9-9.5 Men’s. We received the sandals and my son tried them on and they were way to big. They were actually Men’s 11-1.5.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable! But they were shipped in a bag without a box.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit worried when I saw the package because they were just in a bag with no box. They ended up being in fine condition, but I think that was a bit risky to ship them that way. As for the shoes, I couldn’t be happier. I didn’t realize I’d be getting the soft footbed. I didn’t think I ordered those, but they are awesome—the most comfy Birkenstock’s I’ve ever had so far. I hope they last as long as the regular footbed. Everything about them is super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: The box is broken and beat up probably because if some many times this item has gone back. The inner sole is look worn and the sandal in general seems to have walked some distance. I paid pretty dollar for a new product not a used one. It is a return. I am totally disappointed. It is time to buy local.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bayo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes but I’m so disappointed because they didn’t last. I bought them last summer and only wore them during the summer. Winter I didn’t wear them and it’s only just getting warm and they are already broken on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Combrinck

customer_reviews.title: Real Birkenstock’s!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my old Birkenstock’s and I was hesitant to buy some online but I’m glad I did! These arrived quickly and were the real thing. Yes they can take a little bit to wear in but that’s true of a lot of shoes. I was able to start wearing mine right away and I love them because they help with arch support. These are great and I would buy my Birkenstock’s through amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: They are so comfortable and great for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I wear them daily, instead of slippers. They are so comfortable and great for my feet. I've not been without a pair in around 20 years. The only reason it got a 4 star and not 5 is because they don't last as long as they used to. The first pair I bought lasted me 9 years. Now I get about 2 years out of a pair before they need replaced. And for the price, they should last longer than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: HConnor

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled with material.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted Birks for ages and finally ordered these. I was surprised how wide the normal width are. I have wide feet so it was great. I was disappointed in the look though. For $100 I expect them to look a lot nicer than they did. The Birko Flor or whatever they call the non leather material looks cheap. I actually like the look of my knockoffs from Target better. As much as I wanted them, I returned them. I think I’ll look for a leather pair and spend the extra to get them.
customer_reviews.author: The_dooze

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit.
customer_reviews.text: Fake. I returned them. 100% fake. I know for sure 100%. I compared them side by side with my amazing real. Ones.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Knight

customer_reviews.title: FAKE BIRKENSTOCKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE FAKE BIRKENSTOCKS. Extremely bad quality. I can tell that the “leather” is superglued to cheap cork. I’ve never felt the need to leave a review for a bad products but these are so disappointing I needed to let the world know. Do not buy these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: belle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I have pretty bad arches, so buying any sandal/slipper is always a known bad for me. I can wear them a bit, then my feet start killing me. I wanted to get something that looked nicer than your standard flip-flops so I got these. I've been out for hours with these on a few times now and my freaking arches DO NOT hurt! I am so shocked and happy by that.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Yeltsin

customer_reviews.title: Original women’s medium, no unisex & if you wear medium shoe, the narrow will fit?!!!’
customer_reviews.text: This white pair is unisex size. The straps are too wide for my lady feet. They still hurt my feet. I wear them a couple of hours, 2-3 days a week. They still have not formed to my feet. If it’s not woman’s size, medium width , I will not buy again. I kept them too long trying to get them to fit that I can’t return them. I have 16 pairs , different styles & worn a lot. My oldest pair is probably 20 years old. All leather, original cork soles. None of this soft sole stuff. I want original Birkenstock’s! I know they cost more money, going back to “get what you pay for”.
customer_reviews.author: Nannie Peg

customer_reviews.title: It's the real thing, but size chart was confusing.
customer_reviews.text: PROS - Its a Brirkenstock Product. CONS - Once you get past the usual complaint or sigh regarding the cost the one area that could use improvement is the size chart. I had to double check it a few times and asked a co-worker to help me verify. Improvement in this area could be geared to a particular market with very little effort. That's a bit disappointing. CONCLUSION - Your getting a well made sandle/shoe with reasonable shipping times but double check the size chart. If you found this helpful please click the link below. Thank you, Peter.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Franzke

customer_reviews.title: Wish these held up better in water (rain)
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes/sandals, but I just wish they held up better when they accidentally get wet. Also, I wore mine to our house in the Philippines, and while they didn't get wet, they started to fall apart from the humidity! The glue holding it together just disappeared and they whole thing basically fell apart in 6 months. I don't blame the show itself, as my husband has a pair from 20 years ago...they just aren't made for extreme conditions such as heat, humidity and god forbid they get wet. So I have to give 4 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dee

customer_reviews.title: Okay, But Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I had only worn these 4 times when the fur started to wear away at the toes. For the price, one would expect it to wear better than this. It is a typical Birkenstock and requires some "breaking in", and I don't mind that at all. I wouldn't order these again because of the fur wearing away so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: L. P. Zuber

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandals
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are nice looking and well made. The upper strap hit my leg as I walked when I tried them on, so I returned them. Also the material doesn't feel like leather. The shipping comes from Europe in the original Birkenstock box placed into a mylar mailer, so it really got beat up in the process, but the sandals were fine upon inspection. Wish they had fit my foot a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn Magaditsch

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a Chinese counterfeit but not bad
customer_reviews.text: My wife and daughter decided to order these and I don't know if they looked at past reviews. The sandals took almost 2 weeks to ship and when looking at why, it was because they were shipping directly from China. When they did finally arrive, the sandals themselves were actually pretty nice. As a comparison, a friend had the same style sandals in leather and the same size. You can see in the pictures the subtle differences between what we received (in Blue) and what are true Birkenstocks (in Tan). The buckle is slightly smaller and the Birkenstock stamp in not in the same place. Overall, my daughter likes them and doesn't really mind that they may be fake.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D.

customer_reviews.title: Not a Birkenstock Regular- Its Narrow....
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sandal, but it is NOT a regular width- its a Birkenstock specific narrow. I wish people knew the difference between the two. I don't wear wide shoes in any other shoe except I have to have the regular/wide width in Birk's because of the deep contoured footbed. So sadly I have to send these beauties back and hunt down a regular width. So hard to find! :( Also these ship from England so when the box arrived it looked like the carrier has chewed it up and spit it on my doorstep. Don't expect to keep the box. The shoes were fine of course but geez.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Haak

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I was paranoid that these would be fakes but thankfully I brought them into my local authorized Birkenstock store and they ensured me they are legitimate! I usually wear 38 in regular width Birkenstocks but thankfully I ordered the 39 size because these are NARROW width. Absolutely stunning though! I’m obsessed with them and can’t wait for them to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Veee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for city living
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my pregnant feet and city living future mom! I baseline have wide feet with bunions so this actually is perfect for me. I’m still in the breaking in process but I have faith as it molds to my feet they will get more comfortable over time. Someone said these were knockoffs but I did quite a bit of research and compared the two and couldn’t find any fault - so far they are genuine to me! Love the neutral color and the straps don’t rub on my feet which is great. Can’t wait to break these puppies in and walk around post-COVID with the little babes!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Oh

customer_reviews.title: Birks are #1
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after having previously purchased the Birkenstock Boston Clogs. I have to say--I am in love! I have worn my clogs almost every day during the fall/winter and into this spring. I found these for a great price, and I could not be happier. I'd give these shoes a 10-star if I could! The straps are adjustable, which are convenient for heat swelling in the feet. I purchased the soft beds this time around, and I can say that the are quite a bit softer compared to the original, but both form to your feet and are comfortable. In a word: I approve!
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Did my research before buying to insure I didn't have to make any returns and it paid off. For me 6-6.5 is the same at 37. Chose narrow because I read a few reviews that narrow equated to a more snug and less floppy fit, I found this to be true as well. No issues so far. They arrived in a beat up funky box which didn't match the description of what I ordered but the item was new and appeared unworn. If they fall apart in a few months, I'll update the review but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: dobiehawks

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size smaller if you are a female version of a human.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very wide and a little too long and very uncomfortable at first but I’m trying to break them in and have the buckles cinched at the tightest option. I thought of taking them to a shoe maker to tighten the straps and cut off the excess. The ridge under the toe area does not position just right for my feet. These feel like a man’s foot might fit better than my female foot. The online directions said to select my normal size but I think I should have selected a half size smaller. Also they show to be unisex! I prefer either male or female; not somewhere in the middle!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Cronin

customer_reviews.title: ... is my first pair of vegan birk's and I love them! I was not searching for vegan but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of vegan birk's and I love them! I was not searching for vegan but was searching for the red in my size. So I took a chance and I have to say that they fit great and look like regular birk's. I love them!!!!! The arrived without the Birkenstock box but they were wrapped nice and in perfect shape. Which is great since they are brand new. Would definitely use this vendor again and would definitely buy vegan again.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: and they were fine (just needed the standard "breaking in" period
customer_reviews.text: This would have been my third pair of the exact same sandal over the years. For some reason, this pair did not feel right on my feet; they hurt, perhaps did not bend where they should. I returned them, bought the same model from Zappos, and they were fine (just needed the standard "breaking in" period.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Love my Birkenstocks
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Birkenstocks for over 20 years and I absolutely love them. I'll wear a pair for years and then decide to get another. I can assure you, the pair I received are authentic Birkenstocks. I'm so very pleased. I've never gotten the green color, but I absolutely love it. It's a kind of worn out green but these are brand new Birkenstocks. I love the weathered look. Every bit of these shoes are new. The green leather is new, it just has a worn look to it. Came very quickly. Will order again from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: L. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Fast Delivery!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous.Awesome.Birks! What else can I say except this is an EXCELLENT product. Worth every red cent. My color in the photo is Oiled Iron, Leather.Normally I buy vegan leather, but in shoes, I need the real stuff for good foot care. And, the seller is excellent too..got my Birks 3 days EARLY. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: ROSEMARY PACHECO

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 36-37 in Dansko and anywhere from a 6-61/2 M-W. With that, I purchased the 36 Narrow since originally bought the 37 Medium. 37 Medium was huge in length and width. The 36 fits great in length and the Narrow, with the adjustable buckles, fits well. So getting the correct fit is crucial! I don’t wear them with socks so I could wear thin socks and adjust the buckles, but I would need the Medium if I wanted to wear regular socks- know that some people live in these shoes no matter the season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sandals with Proper Support
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these sandals are pretty nice as I would hope at this price. They do take 1-2 weeks to break in, but once they do they are very comfy and offer great support. Usually sandals after a certain period of time bother my feet from the lack of support, but I can pretty much stay in these all day. I wish they were a bit cheaper but compared to other sandals on the market, there is no competition. If your looking for a good quality sandal and has great support, then this it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Meets (Already High) Expectations
customer_reviews.text: No surprises, just what I like. I'm replacing worn-out sandals; this will be the 3rd or 4th "Arizona" pair for me (over many years...). This time, I liked the price and the delivery service. It was like paying (below MSRP) and waving a magic wand, and my feet were happy.
customer_reviews.author: HGS

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal but wears out too fast for what they charge
customer_reviews.text: Birkenstocks are Birkenstocks, and the shape of the footbed is what it's all about. I think the price is far too high, and the cork breaks down way too fast for something I pay this much for. But I like wearing them, so I just have to suck it up. Buying them just a little large keeps me from walking down the heel as quickly, but as they stretch out, I have to put new holes in the straps and cut off the excess.
customer_reviews.author: Key Player

customer_reviews.title: Metallic don't last too long
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a few months and the metallic is already ruined. In fact, when it arrived, it was already scratched but I was too lazy to return it. The scratches are very noticeable too so I would probably try one without the shine. It was probably one size larger for me, so it's a bit bigger, wider, and looser than I would have liked. But otherwise, it's super easy to wear. It's very comfortable and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: lindism

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: There’s clumps of glue on the uppers attached to the footbeds of the shoe. Leads me to believe these aren’t authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Blue Birkenstocks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the winter when they were on sale. This is my second pair of the Arizona style. I normally wear a 12B in women’s running shoes and these are a 42 narrow. This style takes some break in time. It’s worth the breaking in period. Once they are broke in you won’t want to wear any other sandals. The brown ones I purchased last year and they are still comfortable! I love the blue color is so bright!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable sandle
customer_reviews.text: Everyday wear in the summer months since I purchased these Walked 6 miles in them just the other day a d my feet felt great afterwards They've held up really well, I normally purchase Reefs, these will hold up years longer
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and true men's staple
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband and they fit perfectly for his Size12 wide feet. They are comfortable great for long walks and the suede unlike oiled leather version (he has both) doesn't leave rub marks on the top of feet, no break in time needed. The straps are durable and color doesn't run even if effected by moisture. The 2 strap design make them easy to slip on or off and when on they don't slip and are adjustable. They are a true staple!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected
customer_reviews.text: These are way too big. The description stated Womens Birks but these are at least 2 to 3 sizes too big. The box explained that. UK 7, US 9. I ordered a US 7. The only thing leather on these is the footbed over the cork. The straps are thin PU leather that I don't believe would hold up for weeks. I have always had Birkenstocks (40+ years) these are not in the same league. Even the buckles are thin. I am so disappointed. I am returning these but will not replace with this same listing.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P

customer_reviews.title: good not great
customer_reviews.text: fits like the normal birks. HOWEVER the shearling allows your foot to slide quite a bit. therefore, i needed to adjust the leather until it reached its tightest. i would like to tighten it one more notch but thats not an option. also, the black shearling has stained my heel black! who would've thought?! although the stain does go away when i exfoliate, it returns as soon as i wear them again. have worn daily for two months. just call me black heel macgee...
customer_reviews.author: MOMof4

customer_reviews.title: Never out of style
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product, great support, always the best craftsmenship. Well made, timeless, dependable. I love these shoes. I wear them around the house and walking the dog and whenever comfort and support are my primary aims. Nothing beats a geniune Birkestok. and man was I happy to be able to find them online and at a great price and easily delivered to my house.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal!
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals for a great price! I love the black oiled leather. I love the look and feel of the leather (not the typically shiny leather). Keep in mind that with these sandals you should probably order a size down... I usually wear a 10 and I found the 9 (42) to be the right fit. You should definitely try these on in the store before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Varghese

customer_reviews.title: These are the new soft foot bed, which is VERY narrow compared with old style
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I thought they were the original (not FFB ) birks. Compared to my current birk sandals, these are almost 1/3 inch narrower in the heel. I got the Regular width and the same size that I have been ordering for decades. Back they go and I still am searching for regular birkenstocks
customer_reviews.author: SailingCats

customer_reviews.title: Great Birkenstock sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Birks and now I have this style...it is quite comfortable and I look forward to wearing it for a long time. Birkenstocks are very comfortable and one of the few sandals I've ever been able to wear for long periods of time including walking and/or standing. I have high arches and have had plantar fasciitis...these enable me to enjoy sandals with no pain or discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: barbsooner

customer_reviews.title: Different color than shown
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the stone color which looks to be a green hue. However when they arrived, they were nowhere near the color that amazon shows for this color. They’re wide/loose on my daughters feet who is 11 years old. We ordered her true size. She likes them so we won’t be returning them. Just beware of the color difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money to ensure you have the best sandal comfort and style!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Major League of sandals. It’s required to own such a beautiful, comfortable and long lasting sandal that goes with all wardrobes abd any atmosphere. These will be your best sandals you’ll ever buy. It’s not a gimmick. It’s German refinery of the sandal that will caress your foot and motivate you To move your feet and get moving with these traditional lifetime sandals. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Love my Birks!
customer_reviews.text: I own a number of Birkenstock sandals. They're comfortable and wear well. I have numerous other pairs of sandals but find myself wearing these almost exclusively. They will last for years. My only complaint is that the bed of the sandals is quite dirty. I think I have some special cleaner from Birkenstock that I can use to clean them. I'll have to try to find it...
customer_reviews.author: addison71

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sandles
customer_reviews.text: I love my Birkenstock’s even though I think they look clunky. However, I need good walking foot wear and these sandles are great. I like them so much that I ordered another pair but ordered them in a narrow. I have a regular width foot but these fit fine, as I read someone else’s review. Took a chance and they were right. They don’t look so wide either. I’d order these again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. They are true to size and form fit to my feet perfectly. I was having issues with off brands and needing to replace them every couple months, but so far i've had no signs of wear and tear on these. I also had a pleasant time with the seller when I originally purchased the wrong size. They processed my refund in a timely matter, no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cheese Please? No Way!
customer_reviews.text: Ok the width & Arch support was fine. BUT! My Husband’s from Germany and been wearing Birkenstock’s all his life and he has never had a pair to make his feet smells like cheese! I’m not sure if the in soles are real leather or some other material. He has to wear socks with them now to keep the cheese smell off his feet. He has had these shoes since April so I can’t send them back or I would ASAP!!! Must not be Authentic Birkenstock’s. I am not happy!....Especially because I don’t like cheese!
customer_reviews.author: Dre B.

customer_reviews.title: The Birkenstock name means quality; still true!
customer_reviews.text: It'll be two years this summer since I bought this shoe, and the comparable brown one too. Both are on my feet almost every day. LOVE my Birkenstocks! The sandal adapted to my feet in a short time and now I can't be without them. Caution: Do not squat down such that the cork liner gets bent; that cork will crack at that bending point! Fortunately this style has wrapped leather in the area of bend, so it withstands more than other styles.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: The box was damaged upon arrival. Also, there ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was damaged upon arrival. Also, there were a few scuffs and marks as is these shoes were worn before. I also am not sure if these are genuine as the lining is not consistent with the Birkenstock website. Compare images of the lining of these shoes with the Birkenstock website and you will notice some differences.
customer_reviews.author: William Craig

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: For years I've heard people rave about Birkenstock shoes so I thought I would give them a try. I don't see why people like these shoes so much. They're pricey. They're okay looking. They're okay comfort. I'm okay with what I bought but I won't buy any more Birkenstocks because there are other brands I like much better which aren't as expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Deas

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but hard to step into.
customer_reviews.text: I swear by Birks. I thought I'd try out the suede style straps this time, and am somewhat disappointed. Softer on your feet, but a huge pain to slip on as the straps collapse down. Makes me not want to wear them when I'm going to drive somewhere, as I slip them off to drive—it can take 5-10 seconds to get them both one without using my hands in the driver's seat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Popp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Normally I have been getting the European size 37 for my feet and I am about a 6-6.5 US. I had to return the original order and size down to a 36. They fit perfectly. This is my third pair, and I can't live without a pair. And I really love the color of these.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mikkelsen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: These sandals were sold out for quit a while and one day I was just checking out what was available and they were back in stock. I bought them faster than lightening. The color is beautiful and not really as red as the picture. More of a bordeaux. If you own a pair of Birkenstocks already, then you know they are a good investment and last forever.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernBelle

customer_reviews.title: Not real! Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my daughter for Christmas. She got them on December 25th and didn't wear them until the weather warmed up. The straps have since torn in multiple places. Very cheap and obviously fake.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B

customer_reviews.title: A Birkenstock Fan Since the 70s.
customer_reviews.text: My shoes arrived sooner than expected (from Germany) and that was a pleasant surprise. I was a little disappointed that the shoes were a little bit wide for my foot. Normally I wear a medium width (Chakos and Danskos and Keens). However, with these being unisex they run a little bit wide. I added another hole in each of the straps and now they fit perfectly. These shoes are SO comfortable that I ordered a second pair in a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Driving Miss Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a pair from DSW and decided to see what the price would be on Amazon. I found the exact same style and color for $50 less. I ordered them at that very moment! I wanted to be sure they were the same before I returned the pair to DSW. My amazon lake got here and they were exactly the same. I took the DSW pair back for my refund :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Narrow runs a little different
customer_reviews.text: This sandals are super cute! As expected from Birkenstock these are great quality. I have never ordered Narrow from Birkenstock (or any shoe really) and I felt that I needed a bigger size. I own two pair of Birkenstocks in size 38 Reg and they fit fabulously, but the narrow 38 felt a little compact in the toe area once I began to walk (my second toe is a bit long)...I usually wear a size 8 in other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: why change a great item and I never altered from my favorite go ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know how many pair of Birkenstock's Ive owned over the years BUT this is my first pair with a Soft Footbed and they are sooooooo comfy. Don't get me wrong, the originals are also comfy and always will be. So, I thought to myself, why change a great item and I never altered from my favorite go to standard until now. This is one new and Improved item that I now adore. Also, Order one size down IF going off of the Birkenstock Size Chart. I am a 7-1/2 and should order size 38 based on their size chart - BUT I have always purchased in size 37 and they fit perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: DiggsLife

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, but no box?
customer_reviews.text: I agree with another reviewer as I’m not really sure these shoes are completely new. I was expecting them to arrive new in a Birkenstock box, but they were wrapped in a plastic bag instead and don't have any of the original tags on them. I did look them over very carefully and as far as I can tell, they don't look like they've been worn. I have another pair in taupe suede and the regular footbed and these seem just a touch narrower but maybe it's just because they are the soft footbed. I love the color and really like the shoes, but I'm disappointed that they didn't come in the original box.
customer_reviews.author: MrsM

customer_reviews.title: The sandals were genuine Birkies, but...
customer_reviews.text: The available sizes on the product page were shown in American sizes, and I selected 13. However, what they sent was European size 46, which is closer to a size 12 American. I realize that the equivalency between American and Euro sizes is not exact, but bottom line for me is that the sandals did not fit properly. The tips of my toes were practically hanging off the front edge. I returned them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: ABQReader (Stephen Hazlett - Author of contempory & mystery/suspense fiction)

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I love Birkenstock’s. I was hesitant to order from Amazon but against my better judgement went ahead and placed an order. I received them in their logo Birkenstock box and as soon as I pulled them out they looked like the real thing. I tried them on and right away felt the difference. I was very disappointed because they feel nothing like a true Birkenstock sandal would feel like, especially when you have owned many pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing the Arizona pretty much all my adult life. It's a great shoe, easy to slip off at the door and awesome support. There is always a break-in time with Birkenstocks, but they will make your feet happy once the cork warms and forms to your foot. I have a fused ankle and I can't do without it. Highly recommended to anyone with foot problems.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Di

customer_reviews.title: One smaller than the other.
customer_reviews.text: Straps on the right one are about a quarter inch smaller than the left and the holes aren’t the same distance from the edge so no matter what I do the right one is either way too loose or way too tight. I’ve tried to stretch it out but it’s not working. I’ve never seen this with any Birkenstock’s before which makes me wonder if they’re authentic or not.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Classic !
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned a few Birkenstocks in my lifetime. I love the style and how comfortable these sandals are. I bought a pair for my nephew for his birthday and it’s his first ever Birkenstock. He loves it ! The style is classic and guaranteed to last for years.. mine still looks somewhat new despite the years !
customer_reviews.author: S Santiago

customer_reviews.title: BOOYAH! These are real!!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Birkies and Betulas for years. Nothing feels better on your feet. I purchase a pair every year. This vendor DOES have authentic Birkenstock sandals. Thanks for being a qualified supplier.
customer_reviews.author: MeMe

customer_reviews.title: Straps are too loose
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 10 1/2 or 11 in womens shoes so I ordered a 10. They seem fine in the width but the straps are too loose even on the last hole so I made new holes with a nail and they are already feeling loose again. If I make more hole the strap may touch the ground. I guess I should have ordered a narrow fit even though I never wear narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E

customer_reviews.title: Aahhhh! Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wearing these sandals for 3 years now. He has flat feet, causing trouble with his arches. These were recommended by his doctor and have been a real life saver. Since he wears them all of the time in the spring, summer and fall in SC, they get a lot of wear and the traction on the bottom becomes smooth. So I replace them every year with a new pair. Men's shoes are expensive but to buy only one pair of shoes for 9 months out of the year is a bargain for me. I highly recommend these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: SC Girl

customer_reviews.title: The description states that these are leather. They are ...
customer_reviews.text: The description states that these are leather. They are not leather. They are the synthetic birki style upper. They are already starting to crack after wearing two times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BIRKENSTOCK Unisex Arizona Leather Sandal
product_meta.description:
Birkenstock BIRK-552681-White-39 Birkenstock Arizona Patent Leather Sandal Womens Style

This is the real deal. Cork, leather, a buckle or two: these are the simple ideas that have made feet happy for over two hundred years, and that's the original Birkenstock. These shoes are made in Germany since 1774. No smoke, no mirrors, and no gizmos are needed. You walk, the shoe molds to your foot. The shape of the Original Birkenstock Footbed enables body weight to be distributed evenly over the whole foot, providing it with optimal support.
feature_bullets: Birko-Flor upper has a smooth leather-like finish and is lined with a soft fabric for comfort
Anatomically correct cork footbed helps foot health
